channel.title: About on Becca Lynch
channel.description: Recent content in About on Becca Lynch

item.description: Blog 7.21.2022 - Personal, Productive, Political: Can a Tech Company Stay out of Politics? Nearing the end of a company wide meeting, a VP read aloud an employee question regarding the company’s stance on recent reproductive rulings and whether or not the company will weigh in. They shared empathy for employees grappling with... 6.28.2022 - Hindsight is 20/22: Things I Wish I Knew When I Started My Tech Career I realized recently that I’ve hit four years since graduating undergrad and starting a full time job as a software engineer in 2018.
Interactive Online Plotting with Pyodide & Plotly

Currently Reading Book Lovers Henry, Emily Atlas of the Heart: Mapping Meaningful Connection and the Language of Human Experience Brown, Brené The Age of Surveillance Capitalism: The Fight for a Human Future at the New Frontier of Power Zuboff, Shoshana Watching You Jewell, Lisa Previously Read Where the Crawdads Sing Owens, Delia

Work Duo Security Senior Data Scientist Senior researcher on Duo’s Algorithms Research team, leading research initiatives for model improvement. Leading geospatial anomaly detection research, from initial literature review through current deployment and development. Coordinating and collaborating with product and leadership on customer discussions to guide future product directions. Data Scientist (2019-2021) Researcher and developer on Duo Trust Monitor, an anomaly detection platform. Continuously iterated on threat detection models to improve detection precision, including geospatial modeling research and automated model drift detection.
